This is the hardware part of the Centralized Door Lock System using RFID.

The code must be written in C++ and should be compatible with Arduino IDE.
The code must be compatible with the ESP32 DEVKITV1 board.
The code must be well-structured and modular, breaking down functionality into multiple functions and files for better readability and maintainability.
Add comments as necessary to explain the code. Do not add any unnecessary comments.
